# datapower_ratelimitconfiguration (Data Source)

Rate limit configuration

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_ratelimitconfiguration" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_ratelimitconfiguration.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```
